data_usage: The map displays the difference between the average annual mean temperature across the contiguous U.S. for the period 1991-2012, minus that for the period 1901-1960.
methodology: At each grid point across the contiguous U.S., annual mean temperature was averaged for the period 1901-1960. A second average temperature was calculated for the period 1991-2012. At each gridpoint, the difference between the 1991-2012 temperature and the 1901-1960 temperature was calculated, and plotted on a map.
